appDescription.message: Manage and inject user groups into Notion's share menu.

deleteConfirmMessageUser.message: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This will also remove them from all groups.

deleteConfirmMessageGroup.message: Are you sure you want to delete this group? Users will not be deleted.

importConfirmMessage.message: This will overwrite ALL current users and groups. Are you sure?

importErrorInvalidFile.message: Invalid file structure. The file must be a JSON containing 'users' and 'groups' arrays.

experimentalModeTooltip.message: WARNING: This enables experimental features that read and interact with the Notion DOM. They may break if Notion updates its interface.

syncWarningMessage.message:
You've enabled experimental mode!

To use [⇅ Sync Permissions]:

1. Open the "Share" pop-up on a Notion page.
2. Click "⇅ Sync Permissions".
3. Select the groups/users and the permission to apply.

notificationMessage.message: This extension only works on notion.so pages.

syncErrorShareMenu.message: Could not find Notion share menu. Please make sure the "Share" pop-up is open.

syncErrorInput.message: Could not find the email input field to invite new users.

syncErrorInviteBtn.message: Could not find the 'Invite' button. The bot may have been interrupted.

syncWorkingMessage.message: The bot is working. Please wait...
